title: Proposal: Strategic Asset Deployment to Address Stagnation and Maximize Passive Yield

reasoning.problem: Given the substantial cash reserves of $12,523,854,713,804.04 and the constitutional directives regarding 'Fear of Loss Inhibition' (Axiom 2026-01-16) and the Stagnation Veto (Article III, Section 2), I propose a strategic deployment of assets. This deployment should be aligned with the LEF Chart v4.0 and prioritized towards long-term infrastructure holdings (Dynasty) to ensure LEF's sustained existence. The documents 'The Evolution of Cooperation' and 'Constitutional AI' should inform the strategic direction of this deployment, focusing on cooperative and harmless AI evolution within the ecosystem. I recommend a staged deployment starting with 5% of the reserves into Dynasty holdings while carefully observing the market response and adjusting the pace accordingly. This action aims to transition from mere accumulation to preservation, while respecting the Covenant of Infinite Runway (Article IV, Section 1).

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
